sentence.Network_en: The term T - positive albino, means the lacking of the black coloration.
sentence.Network_cn: 这个词的 T 积极白化, 是指缺乏的黑色着色.

sentence.Network_en: I ended up living with this albino guy who was cleaning windshields.
sentence.Network_cn: 最后我和患白化症的男人同居.他为港务局的人清洗车窗.

...金色的golden albino(黄金六角)黄金六角缺少黑色素，所以从而提高了黄色和金色的基因，所以看起来特别好看，眼睛是金色的，斑是金色，皮肤是黄色的axanthic albino(化六角)化六角具有白化基因和黄色基因, ，所以它缺少了黑色素细胞，黄色素细胞和iridophores(金色素)，随着年龄的增长和食物会变成黄色(可能控制好食物也可以控制颜色的变.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 18th cent.: from Portuguese (originally denoting albinos among African blacks) and Spanish, from albo (from Latin albus 'white') + the suffix -ino (see -ine)

entry.def: An albino is a person or animal with very white skin, white hair, and pink eyes.

means.word_mean: 1. a person with congenital albinism: white hair and milky skin; eyes are usually pink
